column4: The Seaweed Bath Co Seaweed Shampoo - Imported
column13:
The Seaweed Bath Co Seaweed Shampoo - Imported (360 ml) Price: Rs.3100

The Seaweed Bath Co. Seaweed Shampoo Balancing Eucalyptus & Peppermint 12 fl oz. (360 ml). Fighting flaking and scaling skin naturally trade with Morrocan Argan Oil100% natural ingredientsparaben free dye free SLS freeFor cosmetic use onlyNo animal testingSoothe Your Strands amp ScalpOur Wildly Natural Seaweed Shampoo combines the naturally nourishing properties of organic seaweed with soothing Moroccan Argan Oil and Vitamin E to gently cleanse and moisturize your hair and scalp. for best results use daily in the bath or shower. Our CompanyOur company is the vision of Adam Grossman who created seaweed-based products to take control of his severely dry skin. Seeking to improve the lives of other dry skin sufferers Adam decided to share these remarkable products and started the Seaweed Bath Co. Ancient Argan OilOur Argan Oil is extracted from the nuts of the indigenous Argania Spinosa tree one of the rarest trees on Earth. Argan Oil is revered worldwide for its moisturizing and soothing properties. Rich in vitamin E and essential fatty acids Argan Oil naturally comforts and nourishes your skin.
